title: Super green dream drink
description: Cucumber, apple and ginger drink is really refreshing and a change from boring old squash. Serve with lots of ice.

show.b01ncdlj: I Can Cook on the Go

steps: Grate the cucumber into a bowl, making sure you catch all the juice.
Stir in the ginger, apple juice and lime juice.
Seive the mixture into a jug, pressing down on the pulp to extract as much juice as possible.
